Articles.Content:
Looks that happened to this tug.

its legs got shifted 3.75 meter to the side. 

4x symmetry with the new hinges to make some landing legs and stabilizers nice as they fit between the engine cluster. However now its just look stupid and makes the tug side heavy. 
It happened while landed on Ike. 
Is this some issue with the hinges has seen something a bit like it on an lander on Minmus but the effect here is just 20 cm.
